snippet: Ethiopia, one of five countries the IAAF says is in "critical care" over its drug-testing systems, will impose lifetime bans on drug cheats, the new president of the Ethiopian Athletics Federation (EAF) said on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: Ethiopia, one of five countries the IAAF says is in "critical care" over its drug-testing systems, will impose lifetime bans on drug cheats, the new president of the Ethiopian Athletics Federation (EAF) said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Ethiopia to Impose Lifetime Bans on Drug Cheats
headline.print_headline: Ethiopia to Impose Lifetime Bans on Drug Cheats
